column5: Looking to book a trip with a buddy Jan 18th and rent a hut for Simcoe Lakers (hopefully). Haven't done it for 20 years and last time as a 7 yr old I was skunked. Lol  Any advice on where to go/who to pick?
Went out with lucky son's a few years ago, got into a few fish including a 12 pounder.
I always had good luck with Floyd Hales, but it had been a long time.

It's a fairly easy walk out to trout grounds in Kempenfelt Bay if you were worried about finding the deep water.   Otherwise, maybe try Bear Point Fish Hut Rentals, Love to Fish Simcoe,  Dave's Fish Huts or Lucky Sons.  There are probably more, but I haven't used one in a long time.
